briefTitle: Lithium and Divalproex for the Treatment of Comorbid Rapid Cycling Bipolar Disorder and Substance Abuse Disorder
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double Blind Comparison of Lithium Monotherapy Versus Lithium Plus Divalproex for the Outpatient Management of Hypomania/Mania in Patients With Rapid Cycling Bipolar Disorder Comorbid With Substance Abuse/Dependence
summary: This study will determine the efficacy and safety of combination therapy with divalproex and lithium for treating mania in people with rapid cycling bipolar disorder and a substance abuse disorder.
